name: The Great Escape
description: Captured, but not defeated, you are being held in the notorious Heldentod camp. This small, converted castle in the middle of nowhere will be your home for the rest of the war; unless you can escape to rejoin the Allied Armies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later Storage: 256 MB available space
